plot: A crazy mobster tries to reincarnate his witch lover in the body of a prostitute, while his demented son goes berserk in a killing rampage.
title: Resurrezione di cuori
plot_es: A crazy mobster tries to reincarnate his witch lover in the body of a prostitute, while his demented son goes berserk in a killing rampage.
plot_en: A crazy mobster tries to reincarnate his witch lover in the body of a prostitute, while his demented son goes berserk in a killing rampage.
